abstract: Manchester City defeats Everton, 3-1, to advance to English League Cup final on 4-3 aggregate; other soccer matches noted.
snippet: Sergio Agüero clinched Manchester City a place in the English League Cup final by scoring the decisive goal in a 3-1 home win over Everton, sealing a 4-3 victory on aggregate.
lead_paragraph: Sergio Agüero clinched Manchester City a place in the English League Cup final by scoring the decisive goal in a 3-1 home win over Everton, sealing a 4-3 victory on aggregate.
